name: part_007
file: tmp_【#いろはにコラボ】祝！恋情詩歌リリース記念3Dコラボ配信！ [qgVPqPYGoTU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Introduction to the dance challenge replay.
Replay of the first dance attempt with reactions.
MC section discussing the dance moves and preparing for the next challenge speed.
Brief MC reacting to the 1.1x speed challenge.
Replay and review of the 1.1x speed dance challenge.

subtitles.original: あ、今の、あ、今のじゃないわ
subtitles.english: Ah, that... ah, that wasn't it.

subtitles.original: ちょっと間違っちゃった
subtitles.english: I made a little mistake.

subtitles.original: それではリプレイ見てみましょう。おー！
subtitles.english: Then, let's look at the replay. Oh!

subtitles.original: あれ？あれ？あれ？あれ？やだ！あれ？
subtitles.english: Huh? Huh? Huh? Huh? Oh no! Huh?

subtitles.original: ちょっとちょっと
subtitles.english: Wait, wait.

subtitles.original: ここまでは大丈夫なはず
subtitles.english: It should be fine up to here.

subtitles.original: やだ、やだ、あー！
subtitles.english: Oh no, oh no, ah!

subtitles.original: あ、よしよし。いい感じに出てますね。
subtitles.english: Ah, okay, okay. It's coming out nicely.

subtitles.original: え、ちょっと待って。みんな振りがバラバラだから
subtitles.english: Wait, wait a minute. Everyone's moves are all over the place.

subtitles.original: 余が間違ってると思われがちだけど
subtitles.english: People tend to think it's me who's wrong, but...

subtitles.original: 何が正しいのかよくわかんなくなっちゃった。ね？
subtitles.english: I've lost track of what's correct. Right?

subtitles.original: 何が正しいんだっけなぁ？
subtitles.english: What was the correct one again?

subtitles.original: でも運営さんの判断を待ちましょう。これは
subtitles.english: But let's wait for management's judgment. This one.

subtitles.original: どうですかね？
subtitles.english: How is it?

subtitles.original: あれ？余、間違えてたかな？
subtitles.english: Huh? Was I wrong?

subtitles.original: では、どうでしたか？
subtitles.english: So, how was it?

subtitles.original: おめでとう！やったー！優しい！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! We did it! So kind!

subtitles.original: でも確かにみんな違う振りのとこもあったから、どれが正解か分かりづらい部分もあった
subtitles.english: But it's true, there were parts where everyone had different moves, so it was hard to tell which was correct.

subtitles.original: そう、練習してからね
subtitles.english: Right, after practicing.

subtitles.original: 絶対これも優しめ判定。これ優しい判定かな？
subtitles.english: This is definitely a lenient judgment. A lenient judgment?

subtitles.original: 企画倒れになっちまうからな
subtitles.english: Because otherwise the project would fail.

subtitles.original: ということで、じゃ、確認はできましたんで。ここからじゃ本番でございます。本番、ここから。
subtitles.english: So, we've done the check. Now it's time for the real thing. The real thing starts now.

subtitles.original: はい、どちらの曲が流れるかわかりませんし
subtitles.english: Yes, and we don't know which song will play.

subtitles.original: 確かにね。これ何倍かもわかんないです
subtitles.english: True. We don't know the speed either.

subtitles.original: えー、1.1からなのかなぁ？
subtitles.english: Eh, will it start from 1.1?

subtitles.original: 順番でくるのかランダムの。それもランダムなのかな？
subtitles.english: Will they come in order or at random? Is that random too?

subtitles.original: あ、1.1からとりあえずいきそうです。ちょっと早いですね
subtitles.english: Ah, it looks like we'll start with 1.1 for now. It's a bit fast.

subtitles.original: でもどっちが来るかわかりません。では、いいですか？
subtitles.english: But we don't know which one is coming. So, are you ready?

subtitles.original: オッケーです。いいですよ
subtitles.english: Okay. We're ready.

subtitles.original: 怖いね
subtitles.english: It's scary.

subtitles.original: せーの、よーい、スタート！
subtitles.english: One, two... Ready, start!

subtitles.original: あー！はやっ！
subtitles.english: Ah! Fast!

subtitles.original: 頑張れ、お嬢！頑張れ！
subtitles.english: Hang in there, Ojou! Hang in there!

subtitles.original: やだ、やだ、やだ、やだ、やったー！
subtitles.english: No, no, no, no, I did it!

subtitles.original: わー！はやっ！あれ？
subtitles.english: Whoa! Fast! Huh?

subtitles.original: ちょっと、手がわかんなくなっちゃう、これ
subtitles.english: Wait, I'm losing track of my hands with this.

subtitles.original: これまだでも1.1倍だからまだいけますよね？
subtitles.english: This is still only 1.1x, so we can still do it, right?

subtitles.original: ちょっとリプレイ見てみましょうか。これおかしい
subtitles.english: Shall we look at the replay? This is strange.

subtitles.original: あ、1.1倍ですからね。おー、お願いします
subtitles.english: Ah, since it's 1.1x. Oh, please [show it].

subtitles.original: リプレイお願いします
subtitles.english: Replay, please.

subtitles.original: あ、よしよし
subtitles.english: Ah, okay, okay.

subtitles.original: あ、いいよ
subtitles.english: Ah, good.

subtitles.original: やだやだやだ
subtitles.english: No, no, no.

subtitles.original: お、でも揃ってる揃ってる
subtitles.english: Oh, but we're in sync, we're in sync.

subtitles.original: あ、おやおやおや
subtitles.english: Ah, oh oh oh.

subtitles.original: うまいうまいうまいうまい
subtitles.english: Good, good, good, good.

subtitles.original: お嬢、最初ね、お嬢最初いいよ、いいよ
subtitles.english: Ojou, the beginning, you were good at the beginning.

subtitles.original: あれ？どっちだった？どっちだった？
subtitles.english: Huh? Which way was it? Which way?

subtitles.original: 運営さん、これはどうでしょうか？ジャッジは？
subtitles.english: Management, how about this? The judge?

subtitles.original: はい、判定は？
subtitles.english: Yes, the judgment?

subtitles.original: おめでとう！やったー！やったー！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! We did it! We did it!

subtitles.original: しょうがないのでのひとこと。この程度のクオリティ
subtitles.english: A word of "nothing we can do". This level of quality...

subtitles.original: あやめちゃんが真ん中がいいのかな？結果こう出るからさ
subtitles.english: Maybe it's better if Ayame-chan is in the middle? Since this is how the result comes out.

subtitles.original: なるほどね。オッケー
subtitles.english: I see. Okay.

subtitles.original: 余、あれですよ、振りでこうやってやってんのソロパートですからね
subtitles.english: Me, that part where I'm doing this move is my solo part.

subtitles.original: あーそうだった
subtitles.english: Ah, that's right.

subtitles.original: 振りじゃないんですよ。ソロパートなんです
subtitles.english: It's not just a move. It's a solo part.

subtitles.original: あやめちゃんのソロ、歌ってるとこのソロだってことにしときましょう
subtitles.english: Let's say it's Ayame-chan's solo, the solo part where she's singing.

subtitles.original: じゃ、続いてまたスピードがアップするそうなので。頑張っていきましょうか
subtitles.english: Then, since the speed is going to go up again. Shall we do our best?

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、ではミュージックスタート！どっちだ？
subtitles.english: Yes, and with that, music start! Which one?
